Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder section of a drab-coloured pottery vessel, two fragments joined, interior grooved, exterior covered with a red-brown slip and with very faint traces of six lines of black-painted hieratic text, one line of cord-marked decoration is also visible.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393089) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393089)
